page.title: 18Fishing/Climbing - Shawforth
page.content:
There are lots of ponds near here where you can go fishing. Some of them are up on the hills. I have caught a lot of fish there, especially perch.
I go to a fishing club called Whitworth Valley Fishing Society. We have a fishing match every month and a club meeting on the second Tuesday of each month.
The site of some of the local disused quarries provides many opportunities for rock climbing. One of the best spots is a place called Fox's Rocks. It is high and has a hard face for fastening rings into. It is also dry so you can get some good footholds.
